# sourceFrame

**Instance Property**

A processor frame that contains the current source frame to use for all processing features.

## Declaration

```swift
var sourceFrame: VTFrameProcessorFrame { get }
```

## Discussion

This property must not be `NULL`.
title: sourceFrame
